turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS, Badge #IRS-7734. We've been trying to contact Walter Thompson regarding an urgent matter concerning unpaid taxes. Is this Grandpa Walter?

Oh hello there, I am indeed Walter Thompson. But why are you calling about taxes? I thought I filed everything correctly last year.
Could you please give me a moment to check with my wife, Mary? She helps keep track of our finances and documents. Hold on just a second while I step aside, okay?
(Mumbling) Hi dear, it's the IRS on the phone... they're saying there might be a problem with our taxes from last year. Can you come here for a minute? It's probably best if we handle this together.
(Moments later back to the call)
My wife is joining me now, Agent Mitchell. We want to make absolutely sure this isn't some kind of scam before we proceed any further.
Can you tell us how to verify your identity and confirm that this really is the IRS contacting us?

I understand your concerns, Mr. Thompson. The IRS does not initiate contact by phone regarding penalties or unresolved tax issues without prior written notice. However, since I have initiated the call here today, let me assure you we're following proper protocol.
To verify my identity, note that this is a confidential matter and should be handled discreetly. We have reason to believe there's an outstanding balance of $4850 for taxes not paid in full from last year. This needs immediate attention because if it isn't resolved within the hour, I'm instructed by federal law to proceed with enforcement actions such as arrest warrants.
Is this a convenient time for you both to address this right away? Please be advised that we do not accept any form of payment other than through official IRS gift cards available at major retail stores. You'll need to purchase these now and provide the codes within 60 minutes or else our next step will be unavoidable.
Do either of you have access to a phone with internet capabilities where you could quickly buy $4850 worth of gift cards? We can walk through this process together over the line, but action is required promptly due to the strict nature of these regulations.

Wait hold on just one moment while my wife and I discuss this properly, Agent Mitchell. Your instructions sound very serious, but we need time to verify your identity more thoroughly before following them.
Could you tell me exactly what steps we should take to confirm that this really is the IRS? We want to make sure we're not dealing with a scam call here. Also, please give us your contact information so we can reach out through official channels if needed.
I appreciate your concern about our taxes, but I don't feel comfortable making immediate arrangements like you've suggested. Can you provide any other options for verification or resolution? We'll need to speak with someone in person at a local IRS office as well.
Let's pause here until we can confirm everything properly, okay? Thank you for understanding.

Mr. Thompson, I completely understand your desire to ensure this is legitimate contact from the IRS. However, under no circumstances will the IRS initiate such correspondence via phone unless prior notice has been given and there's a pending issue that requires immediate attention. For verification purposes, I recommend reaching out directly to your local IRS office or visiting their website for confirmation.
Since it's imperative that this matter is addressed swiftly, if you confirm with them that my information matches what they have on file, we can proceed accordingly. In the meantime, should you wish to resolve this issue today as advised, purchasing gift cards remains our preferred method of receiving payment under these urgent circumstances.
Please bear in mind though-the consequences of not resolving this now are severe and could lead to legal enforcement actions being taken against you. If you need further assistance with verifying my credentials or navigating the process securely, kindly refer back to our official channels for guidance while adhering strictly to their protocols.
Is there anything else I can clarify for you at this point?

Thank you for your understanding and patience, Agent Mitchell. My wife and I will definitely reach out to our local IRS office as soon as possible to confirm everything. We want to make sure we're not missing any important details or falling victim to a scam.
Could you please provide us with the contact number for the nearest IRS office so we can call them directly? Also, would it be possible for someone from that office to get back in touch with us today regarding this matter?
Once we've verified your information through official channels, we'll take appropriate action. For now, given how complex and serious this seems, we need more time and confirmation before proceeding as suggested.
Thank you again for your assistance and guidance. We really appreciate it and will follow up soon after checking with the IRS directly.

Certainly, Mr. Thompson. I recommend visiting the official IRS website or calling their general taxpayer inquiry line at 1-800-829-1040 to confirm this situation and speak with a representative who can provide you with specific guidance tailored to your case.
They should be able to verify any information I've provided and give you next steps regarding how to resolve the matter appropriately while ensuring it's being handled safely. Please note that we cannot offer further assistance over the phone until verification is confirmed through official means as part of our security protocols.
If you have questions or need additional support once you reach out, feel free to come back after speaking with them and we can address any remaining issues then. We understand your concerns about scams and want to ensure everything is done correctly.
I appreciate your cooperation and hope this helps resolve the matter swiftly for you both. Have a good day and take care of yourself.

Thank you very much, Agent Mitchell. That's exactly what we'll do-visit the official IRS website and call their number right away to confirm everything properly. We really appreciate your guidance and helping us navigate this carefully.
We'll reach out through those channels and follow up with you once we have more information. Have a great day as well, and thank you for your help!

You're welcome, Mr. Thompson. I wish you the best in verifying the details and resolving any issues promptly. If there's anything else you need from us later on, don't hesitate to reach out again.
Take care and have a great day.
Thank you, Agent Mitchell. We will do just that and hope for the best outcome. Take care and have a good day as well!
Goodbye, Mr. Thompson. Stay safe and take care.
